author: bbuffone
msg: This is the version 0.5.0 release of the Apache XAP project.  Lots of fixes for performance, UI widgets and others

author: clombart
msg: Apply patch provided by Carsten for issue JCR-1336

author: scheu
msg: If the namespace is not available, then this is an unqualified element and may not have an OMNamespaceImpl.
In such cases, the operation lookup strategy should be used.

author: aconway
msg: - split() to allow separate encode/decode for complex cases.
- Replaced enable_if with overloads, simpler & more flexible.
- removed 0-10 final changes, moving integration point down the stack.
- removed unused and uncompilable (on some compilers) function.
src/tests/Assembly.cpp, Segment.cpp, apply.cpp, serialize.cpp: testing new code.
